Public vis√© :

üìç Jour 1 : Introduction et Bases de l‚ÄôIA

üìç Jour 2 (Optionnel) : Approfondissement et Cas Pratiques

Module 8 : √âvaluation finale et Cl√¥ture (14h45 - 16h30)

Moyen d‚Äôencadrement¬†: (Formateur) :

Le formateur est disponible √† l‚Äôadresse suivante : sylvain-chabaud@hotmail.com

tasks.name: Review program outline for clarity
tasks.description: Examine the structure and coherence of the training program to ensure that it is easily understandable and well-organized

tasks.name: Evaluate program's progressivity
tasks.description: Determine if the training program provides an appropriate sequential learning structure

tasks.name: Identify target audience's level of prior knowledge
tasks.description: Analyze the intended audience's background to adapt the program's difficulty level accordingly

tasks.name: Compare program content with learning objectives
tasks.description: Ensure the training materials and activities are directly related to the stated objectives for the intended audience

tasks.name: Assess teaching methods suitability
tasks.description: Examine if the chosen teaching strategies are suitable for the subject matter and learning objectives

tasks.name: Propose revisions to improve pedagogical strategies
tasks.description: Recommend improvements or modifications to make the program more effective for the target audience
